### <span style="color:#EB6864; font-size: 20pt">flashcards</span>

* I have created a pdf of over 200 flash cards that cover foundations of statistical inference and fundamentals of probability, print double-sided & cut ‚úÅ them out for a fun evening of studying bliss! [[download here](https://github.com/LucyMcGowan/comps-survival-guide/blob/master/FlashCards.pdf)]
* These are hosted on  [github](https://github.com/LucyMcGowan/comps-survival-guide/blob/master/FlashCards.tex) -- please add to them!
* If you notice a mistake, submit a PR & fix it
